title: Crazed
description: I betrayed him…and spied on him for the enemy.What he doesn’t know is… I was forced to do it.Now I have to choose. My life or my heart?So I promise myself I won’t fall for him.It’s an impossible vow.He's fifteen years my senior.Every sinful command that flies past his lips makes me crave him more.And no matter what, he protects me—even from his family who doesn’t trust me.If only I wasn’t living a lie.(CRAZED is book three in Mafia Wars New York. It's an age gap, betrayal, Dark Mafia romance, interconnecting stand-alone, and guaranteed to have an HEA.)
author: Maggie Cole
